TEXT.TITLE: RICHARDSON <RELL>TO BUY ITALIAN SEMICONDUCTOR FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Richardson Electronics Ltd said it agreed to buy for undisclosed terms, G.E.B., Giant Electronics Brand, a Florence, Italy-based distributor of electron tubes and semiconductors. Reuter
